pages.title: Alignment: Expansion
pages.text: <thing>Expansion/$ (teal) will place any items in the world in range as blocks- if they have a block form. The range is a radius of sqrt(<thing>power/$) / 2 (cap 4). This is one of the only ways in Crossroads to place blocks in the world.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Expansion/$ AKA <thing>Contraction/$ will break whatever block it hits and drop it as an item.$(br2)
